basic.production: Watery areas in Yangzte River Valley
basic.blooming: Flowering period March, fruiting period October-November
basic.color: Leaf color green , fruit color yellow brown

maintenance.soil: Acidic soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Resistant to flood, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead, rotten, diseased leaves and the parts that may affect the good appearance
